page.title: 09LEISURE.
page.content: {ENTRY A:}I like to go to the churchyard with Stuart and climb trees. Sometimes I go to Riggies Field and play on the swings and go on the BMX track. Sometimes Stuart and his brother and I go to Texas,a large supermarket. Sometimes we go to the haunted church. Last week Stuart and I were in my house playing with my model aeroplanes. {ENTRY B:}I don't have much spare time. Sometimes I watch the TV or read a book.I practise my 'cello every night for 15-20 minutes. On Monday I go to scouts,and on Tuesday I go to orchestra practice. I sometimes paint pictures or invent things. I have invented a version of Roller Hockey. I also like to go swimming,especially diving in, and also ice-skating.
